categories.name: Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes Mods
categories.description:
A list of mods that I had a part in creating for the game Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes.
These are all written in C# and use Unity.

categories.name: Programming Languages
categories.description: Programming languages (mostly esoteric) that I have created or worked on.

categories.name: Miscellaneous
categories.description: Several random projects that don't fit into another category.

categories.name: Bots and Helpers
categories.description: Bot and helper programs that I have made or worked on.

projects.name: FizzBuzz
projects.description: A classic schoolyard game-turned bomb module.

projects.name: Color Morse
projects.description: Solve mathematical expressions with dots and dashes instead of digits.

projects.name: Ice Cream
projects.description: "I scream, you scream, we all scream for ice cream!" However, this shop only sells bomb-flavored ice cream.

projects.name: Boolean Venn Diagrams
projects.description: Solve for all of the solutions to a logical expression, in a "convienent" venn diagram layout.

projects.name: Edgework
projects.description: Remember to write down EVERYTHING about the bomb...

projects.name: Crossover Modules
projects.description:
A module pack that contains "crossed over" forms of two or more vanilla modules. Currently includes:
- Symbolic Password (Keypads + Passwords): passwords now require symbols AND two-dimensional structure to be secure enough. Who knew?
- Complicated Buttons (Complicated Wires + The Button): press certain buttons in a certain order with certain conditions.

projects.name: Basic Function Language
projects.description: A basic programming language that uses functions to accomplish tasks.

projects.name: Convex
projects.description: An esoteric programming language designed to be very effective in code-golfing competitions.

projects.name: Glava
projects.description: An esoteric programming language that is designed as an abbreviated version of Java to be used in code-golfing competitions.

projects.name: QuoteBot
projects.description: A bot that I wrote for my personal Discord server that handles quote submission for our quotebook.

projects.name: ZekNikZBot
projects.description: A bot that I wrote for my personal Discord server that does a variety of moderation tasks.

projects.name: Battleship Game
projects.description:
A text-based Battleship game featuring multiple players, ship placement, special abilities, and more!
Winner of the Coding category of the 2017 AFUHSD STEM Expo.

projects.name: PPCG Design Userscript
projects.description: A collaborative project to show off our suggestions for the redesign of the Programming Puzzles and Code Golf website.
